message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first.  Given its value, I think a price of $19,000 is fair.  What do you think?
Thank you for considering me, Alice. I appreciate the offer, but given my budget constraints, I can only afford to pay up to $12,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $19,000 is already a competitive price.  Could you meet me halfway at $15,500?

Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but based on my budget, I am unable to meet you halfway. I would like to stick to my original offer of $12,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
